name: Bomb Office
description:
Are you ready to become a professional bomb diffuser? .. or you might just die halfway trying..

Anyways.. to find another way to introduce you to this job, please cut the green cables with your scissor hands (use your left mouse button to do so), after you cut the green cable the bomb will be diffused.. and you will be safe and ready to live another day!

Happy bomb diffusing and one last thing.. don't let the bombs touch the conveyor belt or anywhere else for they will also explode!

Made by Turtle Games 

https://turtlegamesstudio.com/
